title: League login status
body: I tried to login to league of legend at the moment,but it still say logging on for 10minutes already...i logoff and tried again but same thing happen. Then I restarted my laptop and try it once more but still the same.

replies.body:
Myself and two of my friends can't log in at all, pls help

EDIT 11:52: just tried the legacy client one more time and it worked, tried quite a lot of times

>>>>>>>>I FOUND A WAY TO FIX<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<|
guys switch to legacy client and just wait ....i hated it but it will work not going into detail of it try it takes about 5mins
i tried legacy client didnt work xd

well the steps i took are as follows log in to website check firewall changed nothing .
switch cleints ..... and wait till you time out or sign in may take 3-5 times
but i have reproduced this affect of 6 comps now
bump 5 more ppl at my net cafe
Something is wrong with the server. Check the "Client slow" trend
guess riot needs to update the server status, my discord channel cannot log onto league at all, authenticating log in for the past 20 minutes
same. might be the problem of the server
Me n my friends tried so hard to login on, but stocked for more than 20mins, fix it pls
also changed the subnet gateway default on each persons comp to .244 but dont think that applies to anyone else
yeah iv been trying all night log in finally then its starts getting buggy
Legit fucking trash, I just want to play one to get free ip but riots cardboard box servers cant handle the porn i sent them.
